body:
### Welcome to SGT7.
SGT7 is an opensource firmware based on [CyanogenMod](http://www.cyanogenmod.com/).
Optimized for tablets, it has a lot of tweaks which will make your tablet experience a lot better.

## Downloads
[SGT7](http://sgt7.tk)

[Mirror](http://goo.im/devs/cdesai/jenkins)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: SGT7
